official_title: A bill to amend section 3626 of title 39, United States Code, to make the rates for third-class mail matter mailed by nonprofit community or civic improvements organizations the same as the rates for third-class mail matter mailed by organizations considered qualified nonprofit organizations under former section 4452 of such title.

summary.text: Entitles nonprofit community or civic improvement organizations to the reduced postal rates for third-class mail currently in effect for qualified nonprofit organizations.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 3626 of title 39, United States Code, to make the rates for third-class mail matter mailed by nonprofit community or civic improvements organizations the same as the rates for third-class mail matter mailed by organizations considered qualified nonprofit organizations under former section 4452 of such title.
